import sys

def is_diverse(text):
    """
    >>> is_diverse("fced")
    True
    >>> is_diverse("xyz")
    True
    >>> is_diverse("r")
    True
    >>> is_diverse("dabcef")
    True
    >>> is_diverse("az")
    False
    >>> is_diverse("aa")
    False
    >>> is_diverse("bad")
    False
    >>> is_diverse("babc")
    False
    """
    ord_a = ord("a")
    ord_z = ord("z")
    ord_text = [ord(c) for c in text]
    ord_text.sort()
    if len(text) != len(set(text)):
        return False
    if not (ord_a <= ord_text[0] <= ord_z):
        return False
    if not (ord_a <= ord_text[-1] <= ord_z):
        return False
    if ord_text[0] == ord_a and ord_text[-1] == ord_z:
        return True
    first_ord = ord_text[0]
    last_ord = ord_text[-1]
    if (last_ord - first_ord + 1) != len(ord_text):
        return False
    for i, ord_char in enumerate(ord_text[:-1]):
        if ord_char + 1 != ord_text[i + 1]:
            return False
    return True

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    for i in range(n):
        text = sys.stdin.readline().strip()
        if is_diverse(text):
            print("Yes")
        else:
            print("No")

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n = int(input())

for _ in range(n):
    s = input()
    print("Yes" if len(set(s)) == len(s) and len(set(s)) == ord(s[-1]) - ord(s[0]) + 1 else "No")
